author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION CONTINUES MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OVER THE OPEN TROPICAL ATLANTIC OCEAN...
summary:
...DEPRESSION CONTINUES MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OVER THE OPEN TROPICAL ATLANTIC OCEAN...
 As of 5:00 PM AST Thu Sep 12
 the center of Seven was located near 18.3, -35.9
 with movement WNW at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Seven (AT2/AL072024)
